OOC: I have used Quake for your information and I'm trying to dig up someth=
ing for him to do. But it seems that the Alliance don't do anything anymore=
.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: gunthers8@... 
  To: nbw=
rpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July 15, 2001 12:08 AM
  Subject: Re: =
The D.E.D are back./Shockwave talk...


  Quake continued to drive forward.=
  Not even listening to Apeface, he talked to Tiptop.  "You know, that name=
 Quake was good enough on Cybertron, but here i need a new one. How bout Tr=
emor."

  "Sounds cool to me"

  "Right on" he said as Tremor plowed into t=
he tree Apeface was on.  "Apeface, report back to base to see if they had h=
eard anything."
  OOC:Happy Orchid.....sorry to ruin you plans with someone=
 you have never used....
  0-----------------------------------------------=
------------------------0
  OOC: Jer the base is inside of MT. Fuji....ther=
e is a tunnell going up out of it, and it sits in a crater with lava on the=
 outer side of the crater.  I want the Constructicons to build a bridge and=
 another tunnel to the outside that is flat.

  BIC:
  Havotron turned to N=
ightmare. "Yes, bring him to me."

  Scrapper sat and waited for a response=
 from the Decepticons. (hint hint Jer)
  0---------------------------------=
-------------------------------------0

  Dreadwind spoke again to Shockwav=
e.  "Shockwave, are you part of a Decepticon party on this planet?"
  nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com wrote:
  >
  > Apeface gracefully soars out of the ships =
surrounding area. He flies
  > towards a tall tree, and at his roaring 400 =
mph, transforms into his ape
  > mode, Spasma holding on to his back, and d=
oes a graceful front flip,
  > before his feet grab into the thick bark of =
the tree to keep him
  > upright, as he looks around. "If he still alive, h=
e not here." Apeface
  > reports.
  > -------------------------------------=
---------------------------------
  > Nightmare looks to Needlenose, "Yes s=
ir. Suggest we release our sub
  > comander sir." he suggested, still at pe=
rfect attention, as the smoke
  > began to lesten, and he nodded towards th=
e chamber Spinister was in.
  > ___________________________________________=
___________________________
  > Hook continues to wait for Mixmaster and Sc=
avanger. He looks around, and
  > wonders what could be taking them so long=
.
  > 
  > OOC: Sorry to ask again Gunther, but where exactly is the base. =
I know
  > it's in Japan, but where? in the water, underground?
  >
